member.name: T:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.DteHelper
member.summary: Helper class to fetch DTE instances.

member.name: M:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.DteHelper.CreateDteInstance
member.summary:
Tries to create a DTE instance. First it tries to start a new Visual Studio instance and to fetch the DTE instance. If that fails we fall back to creating the Instance via Activator.CreateInstance. If possible we return the process-Id of the Visual Studio instance (or -1 otherwise).
If something goes wrong no process is opened (i.e. this method cleans up the opened process) otherwise the caller needs to take care about closing the Visual Studio instance.

member.name: M:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.DteHelper.CleanupDteInstance(System.Int32,EnvDTE80.DTE2)
member.summary: Cleanup the given DTE instance and kill the process after some timeout.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TemplateNotPartOfSolutionException class.

member.name: T:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost
member.summary: See https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb126579.aspx for more details

member.name: M:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost.LoadIncludeText(System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: The engine calls this method based on the optional include directive if the user has specified it in the text template.

member.name: M:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost.GetHostOption(System.String)
member.summary: Called by the Engine to enquire about the processing options you require. If you recognize that option, return an appropriate value. Otherwise, pass back NULL.

member.name: M:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost.ResolveAssemblyReference(System.String)
member.summary: The engine calls this method to resolve assembly references used in the generated transformation class project and for the optional assembly directive if the user has specified it in the text template. This method can be called 0, 1, or more times.

member.name: M:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost.ResolveDirectiveProcessor(System.String)
member.summary: The engine calls this method based on the directives the user has specified in the text template. This method can be called 0, 1, or more times.

member.name: M:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost.ResolvePath(System.String)
member.summary: A directive processor can call this method if a file name does not have a path. The host can attempt to provide path information by searching specific paths for the file and returning the file and path if found. This method can be called 0, 1, or more times.

member.name: M:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost.ResolveParameterValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: If a call to a directive in a text template does not provide a value for a required parameter, the directive processor can try to get it from the host by calling this method. This method can be called 0, 1, or more times.

member.name: P:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost.TemplateFile
member.summary: Path and file name of the template currently processing

member.name: P:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost.FileExtension
member.summary: Default fall-back if not specified by the file

member.name: P:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.VisualStudioTextTemplateHost.FileEncoding
member.summary: Encoding of the Output file

member.name: T:AIT.Tools.VisualStudioTextTransform.MessageFilter
member.summary: Fix COM retry errors: http://www.viva64.com/en/b/0169/
